git_activity.title: Fix Flight Status API SSL Expiry Issue
git_activity.description: Renew SSL certificate and update API gateway configs to prevent downtime.

commits.message: Renew SSL certificate for upstream provider
commits.author: Eve Martinez

commits.message: Add API health check to prevent future SSL issues
commits.author: Eve Martinez

pr_comments.comment: Please ensure certificate renewed before next flight schedule.
Verified API response after renewal. All checks passed.

git_activity.title: Fix Cargo Overbooking Validation Bug
git_activity.description: Update booking logic to prevent cargo overbooking for flights over 100%.

commits.message: Add validation for max cargo capacity in booking API
commits.author: Eve Martinez

pr_comments.comment: Manual intervention in place until PR merged.
Please prioritize this fix. Critical issue for upcoming flights.

git_activity.title: Add Cron Job Recovery for Flight Data Sync
git_activity.description: Fix cron job failure issue during server maintenance to ensure flight schedules sync.

commits.message: Add retry logic to cron flight data sync
commits.author: Eve Martinez

commits.message: Add monitoring alert for cron failures
commits.author: Eve Martinez

pr_comments.comment: Tested cron retry locally, working fine.

git_activity.description: Correct rounding errors in cargo weight calculations for items over 500kg.

commits.message: Fix rounding logic for cargo weight > 500kg
commits.author: Eve Martinez

pr_comments.comment: Manual weight verification in place until fix merged.
